attributes.action: Allow only the import of Palm Oil and goods containing Palm oil from sources which do not result in the destruction of the Orangutans natural habitat
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Orangutan is a critically endangered species it naturally exists only in Borneo and Sumatra. Its natural habitat is being destroyed to clear the way for Palm Oil plantations. If we source only palm oil goods from non destructive sources we may be able to save asias only great ape.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Allow only the import of Palm Oil and goods containing Palm oil from sources which do not result in the destruction of the Orangutans natural habitat."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page10972.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/savetheorangutan/
